Instructor: Anders Kraal.
The course offers a survey of 17th-century philosophy, with a focus on key writings of Descartes, Spinoza, and Leibniz. The historical context of 17th century philosophy, including the religious and scientific context, will be taken into account.
description: Survey of 17th-century philosophy from Bacon to Leibniz, including the writings of Hobbes, Descartes, and Spinoza. The influence of science and religion on philosophical thought.
